original_text: And when she hath found it, she calleth her friends and her neighbours together, saying, Rejoice with me; for I have found the piece which I had lost.
korean_text: 또 찾아낸즉 벗과 이웃을 불러 모으고 말하되 나와 함께 즐기자 잃은 드라크마를 찾아내었노라 하리라

sentences.original_text: And when she hath found it
she calleth her friends and her neighbours together
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 자신의 친구들과 이웃들을 함께 부르며

sentences.original_text: for I have found the piece which I had lost
